languages.text: "Но тьма пришла и за нами. В этом последнем отсеке, где мы хотели дать последний бой. Тогда я... принес себя в жертву... стал фильтром, запором для скверны, что источала машина. Я не устоял... Скверна пришла за нашими душами. Скверна Кьявы Гамма... предатели..." {n}С последним усилием человек хрипит:{/n} "Фабрикатор-Цензор! Все началось с него! Это он пустил скверну в священный код! Это он обрек нашу братию на погибель! Это он породил стальных чудовищ в горниле нашей планеты!"

traits.locale_text: "Но тьма пришла и за нами. В этом последнем отсеке... где мы хотели дать последний бой. Мы забыли, кто мы и зачем мы здесь. Делали то, что подсказывал шепот из стен. Скверна пришла за нашими душами. Скверна... Кьява Гамма... предатели..." {n}С последним усилием человек хрипит:{/n} "Фабрикатор! Это он пустил скверну в священный код! Это он вел предателей!"

languages.text: "But the darkness came for us too. In this last module, where we intended to make our last stand. Then I... sacrificed myself... I became a filter, a stopper against the corruption emanating from the machine. I succumbed... The corruption came for our souls. The corruption of Kiava Gamma... traitors..." {n}With the last of his efforts, he rasps,{/n} "The Fabricator-Censor! It all started with him! He was the one who let this taint into the sacred code! He was the one who doomed our brethren! He was the one who spawned the steel monstrosities in the furnace of our planet!"
languages.original_text: "Но тьма пришла и за нами. В этом последнем отсеке, где мы хотели дать последний бой. Тогда я... принес себя в жертву... стал фильтром, запором для скверны, что источала машина. Я не устоял... Скверна пришла за нашими душами. Скверна Кьявы Гамма... предатели..." {n}С последним усилием человек хрипит:{/n} "Фабрикатор-Цензор! Все началось с него! Это он пустил скверну в священный код! Это он обрек нашу братию на погибель! Это он породил стальных чудовищ в горниле нашей планеты!"

I became a filter, a stopper against the corruption emanating from the machine. I succumbed... The corruption came for our souls. The corruption of Kiava Gamma... traitors..." {n}With the last of his efforts, he rasps,{/n} "The Fabricator-Censor! It all started with him! He was the one who let this taint into the sacred code! He was the one who doomed our brethren! He was the one who spawned the steel monstrosities in the furnace of our planet!"

"But the darkness came for us too. In this last module, where we intended to make our last stand. We forgot who we were and why we were here. We did what the whispers from the walls prompted us to. The corruption came for our souls. The corruption of Kiava Gamma... traitors..." {n}With the last of his efforts, he rasps,{/n} "The Fabricator! It all started with him! He was the one who let the taint into the sacred code! He was the one who doomed our brethren! He was the one who spawned the steel monstrosities in the furnace of our planet!"

The corruption of Kiava Gamma... traitors..." {n}With the last of his efforts, he rasps,{/n} "The Fabricator-Censor! It all started with him! He was the one who let this taint into the sacred code! He was the one who doomed our brethren! He was the one who spawned the steel monstrosities in the furnace of our planet!"

languages.text: “可就连黑暗也来狩猎我们了。我们呆在这最后的舱室里，准备进行最后的反抗。于是我……我牺牲了自己……我自愿成为了过滤器，试图阻止机械的腐化，可我却被打败了……于是，我们的灵魂被腐化、感染……基亚瓦伽马星的腐化……那些叛徒……”{n}他拼尽最后的力量，咆哮着吼道。{/n}“铸造审查师，一切都是从他开始的！就是他污染了神圣的代码！就是他让我们的兄弟们步入歧途！就是他，在那颗行星的熔炉之中，制造出了那些钢铁怪物！”
languages.original_text: "But the darkness came for us too. In this last module, where we intended to make our last stand. Then I... sacrificed myself... I became a filter, a stopper against the corruption emanating from the machine. I succumbed... The corruption came for our souls. The corruption of Kiava Gamma... traitors..." {n}With the last of his efforts, he rasps,{/n} "The Fabricator-Censor! It all started with him! He was the one who let this taint into the sacred code! He was the one who doomed our brethren! He was the one who spawned the steel monstrosities in the furnace of our planet!"

traits.locale_text: “可就连黑暗也来狩猎我们了。我们呆在这最后的舱室里，准备进行最后的反抗。我们已经忘记了我们是谁，忘记了我们为什么会在这里。墙壁中的低语声引诱我们，我们按照那个声音行事。于是，我们的灵魂被腐化、感染……基亚瓦伽马星的腐化……那些叛徒……”{n}他拼尽最后的力量，咆哮着吼道。{/n}“铸造审查师，一切都是从他开始的！就是他污染了神圣的代码！就是他让我们的兄弟们步入歧途！就是他，在那颗行星的熔炉之中，制造出了那些钢铁怪物！”

languages.text: «Pero la oscuridad también vino a por nosotros. A este módulo, donde pretendíamos organizar la última resistencia. Entonces... me sacrifiqué. Me convertí en filtro, en tapón para la corrupción que brotaba de la máquina. Sucumbí... El origen de la corrupción estaba en nuestras almas. La corrupción de Kiava Gamma... de los traidores...». {n}Con sus últimos esfuerzos, jadea:{/n} «¡El Fabricador-Censor! ¡Todo empezó por él! ¡Fue él quien dejó que esta mancha entrara en el código sagrado! ¡Fue él quien condenó a nuestros hermanos! ¡El que creó esos monstruos de acero en los hornos de nuestro planeta!».
languages.original_text: "But the darkness came for us too. In this last module, where we intended to make our last stand. Then I... sacrificed myself... I became a filter, a stopper against the corruption emanating from the machine. I succumbed... The corruption came for our souls. The corruption of Kiava Gamma... traitors..." {n}With the last of his efforts, he rasps,{/n} "The Fabricator-Censor! It all started with him! He was the one who let this taint into the sacred code! He was the one who doomed our brethren! He was the one who spawned the steel monstrosities in the furnace of our planet!"

traits.locale_text: «Pero la oscuridad también vino a por nosotros. A este módulo, donde pretendíamos organizar la última resistencia. Olvidamos quiénes éramos y por qué estábamos aquí. Hicimos lo que los susurros de las paredes nos impulsaban a hacer. El origen de la corrupción estaba en nuestras almas. La corrupción de Kiava Gamma... de los traidores...». {n}Con sus últimos esfuerzos, jadea:{/n} «¡El Fabricador-Censor! ¡Todo empezó por él! ¡Fue él quien dejó que esta mancha entrara en el código sagrado! ¡Fue él quien condenó a nuestros hermanos! ¡El que creó esos monstruos de acero en los hornos de nuestro planeta!».

languages.text: 「だが、暗闇も我々の元に来た。この最後のモジュールこそ、最後の挑戦だった。そして私は…自らを犠牲にして…フィルターとなった。機械から発せられる腐敗に対するストッパーに。私は屈したのだ…腐敗が我々の魂のもとにやって来た。キアヴァ・ガンマの腐敗…裏切り者…」{n}最後の力を振り絞って、男は声をあげる。{/n}「ファブリケーター・センサー！全てはアイツのせいだ！奴こそこの汚物を神聖なコードに入れたんだ！同胞を破滅に堕としたのも奴だ！我々の惑星にある高炉で鉄の怪物を生み出したんだ！」
languages.original_text: "But the darkness came for us too. In this last module, where we intended to make our last stand. Then I... sacrificed myself... I became a filter, a stopper against the corruption emanating from the machine. I succumbed... The corruption came for our souls. The corruption of Kiava Gamma... traitors..." {n}With the last of his efforts, he rasps,{/n} "The Fabricator-Censor! It all started with him! He was the one who let this taint into the sacred code! He was the one who doomed our brethren! He was the one who spawned the steel monstrosities in the furnace of our planet!"

traits.locale_text: 「だが、暗闇も我々の元に来た。この最後のモジュールこそ、最後の挑戦だった。そして私は…自らを犠牲にして…フィルターとなった。機械から発せられる腐敗に対するストッパーに。私は屈したのだ…腐敗が我々の魂のもとにやって来た。キアヴァ・ガンマの腐敗…裏切り者…」{n}最後の力を振り絞って、男は声をあげる。{/n}「ファブリケーター・センサー！全てはアイツのせいだ！奴こそこの汚物を神聖なコードに入れたんだ！同胞を破滅に堕としたのも奴だ！我々の惑星にある高炉で鉄の怪物を生み出したんだ！」

languages.text: "Aber die Dunkelheit holte auch uns. In dem letzten Modul, wo wir unser letztes Gefecht austragen wollten. Dann ... opferte ich mich selbst ... Ich wurde ein Filter, ein Propfen für die Verderbnis, die aus der Maschine austrat. Ich erlag ihr ... Die Verderbnis wollte unsere Seelen. Die Verderbnis von Kiava Gamma ... Verräter ..." {n}Mit letzter Kraft röchelt er:{/n} "Der Fabricator-Zensor! Mit ihm fing alles an! Er hat den Makel in den heiligen Code gelassen! Er hat unsere Brüder zum Untergang verdammt! Er hat die Stahlmonstrositäten in der Schmiede unseres Planeten erschaffen!"
languages.original_text: "But the darkness came for us too. In this last module, where we intended to make our last stand. Then I... sacrificed myself... I became a filter, a stopper against the corruption emanating from the machine. I succumbed... The corruption came for our souls. The corruption of Kiava Gamma... traitors..." {n}With the last of his efforts, he rasps,{/n} "The Fabricator-Censor! It all started with him! He was the one who let this taint into the sacred code! He was the one who doomed our brethren! He was the one who spawned the steel monstrosities in the furnace of our planet!"

traits.locale_text: "Aber die Dunkelheit holte uns auch. In dem letzten Modul, wo wir unser letztes Gefecht austragen wollten. Wir vergaßen, wer wir waren und warum wir hier waren. Wir taten, was die Flüsterstimmen aus den Wänden von uns verlangten. Die Korruption wollte unsere Seelen. Die Korruption von Kiava Gamma ... Verräter ..." {n}Mit letzter Kraft röchelt er:{/n} "Der Fabricator-Zensor! Mit ihm fing alles an! Er hat den Makel in den heiligen Code gelassen! Er hat unsere Brüder zum Untergang verdammt! Er hat die Stahlmonstrositäten in der Schmiede unseres Planeten erschaffen!"

languages.text: « Mais l'ombre est venue nous chercher à notre tour. Dans ce dernier module, où nous pensions livrer notre ultime combat. C'est alors que... je me suis sacrifié... Je suis devenu une sorte de filtre, un barrage à la corruption émanant de la machine. J'ai succombé... La corruption en voulait à nos âmes. La corruption de Kiava Gamma... maudits traîtres... » {n}À bout de force, il poursuit d'une voix rauque :{/n} « Le fabricator-censeur ! Tout a commencé avec lui ! C'est lui qui a laissé cette abjection profaner le code sacré ! C'est lui qui a condamné nos frères ! C'est lui qui a forgé les monstres d'acier dans les fourneaux de notre planète ! »
languages.original_text: "But the darkness came for us too. In this last module, where we intended to make our last stand. Then I... sacrificed myself... I became a filter, a stopper against the corruption emanating from the machine. I succumbed... The corruption came for our souls. The corruption of Kiava Gamma... traitors..." {n}With the last of his efforts, he rasps,{/n} "The Fabricator-Censor! It all started with him! He was the one who let this taint into the sacred code! He was the one who doomed our brethren! He was the one who spawned the steel monstrosities in the furnace of our planet!"

traits.locale_text: « Mais l'ombre est venue nous chercher à notre tour. Dans ce dernier module, où nous pensions livrer notre ultime combat. Nous avons oublié qui nous étions et ce que nous étions venus faire ici. Nous avons fait ce que les murmures émanant des murs attendaient de nous. La corruption en voulait à nos âmes. La corruption de Kiava Gamma... maudits traîtres... » {n}À bout de force, il poursuit d'une voix rauque :{/n} « Le fabricator-censeur ! Tout a commencé avec lui ! C'est lui qui a laissé cette abjection profaner le code sacré ! C'est lui qui a condamné nos frères ! C'est lui qui a forgé les monstres d'acier dans les fourneaux de notre planète ! »

languages.text: "Lakin karanlık bizi de buldu. Son direnişimizi yapmaya niyetlendiğimiz bu son modülde. Sonra... Kendimi feda ettim... Makineden yayılan yozluğa karşı bir filtre, bir tampon oldum. Karşı koyamadım... Yozlaşma, ruhlarımıza göz dikmişti. Kiava Gama'dan yayılan yozlaşma... Hainler..." {n}Adam son bir gayretle haykırıyor.{/n} "Denetçi Fabrikatör! Her şey onunla başladı! Bu lekenin kutsal koda bulaşmasına o müsaade etti! Kardeşlerimizi ölüme mahkûm eden, gezegenimizin ocağında çelik garabetleri peydahlayan oydu!"
languages.original_text: "But the darkness came for us too. In this last module, where we intended to make our last stand. Then I... sacrificed myself... I became a filter, a stopper against the corruption emanating from the machine. I succumbed... The corruption came for our souls. The corruption of Kiava Gamma... traitors..." {n}With the last of his efforts, he rasps,{/n} "The Fabricator-Censor! It all started with him! He was the one who let this taint into the sacred code! He was the one who doomed our brethren! He was the one who spawned the steel monstrosities in the furnace of our planet!"

traits.locale_text: "Lakin karanlık bizi de buldu. Son direnişimizi yapmaya niyetlendiğimiz bu son modülde. Sonra... Kendimi feda ettim... Makineden yayılan yozluğa karşı bir filtre, bir tampon oldum. Karşı koyamadım... Yozlaşma, ruhlarımıza göz dikmişti. Kiava Gama'dan yayılan yozlaşma... Hainler..." {n}Adam son bir gayretle haykırıyor.{/n} "Denetçi Fabrikatör! Her şey onunla başladı! Bu lekenin kutsal koda bulaşmasına o müsaade etti! Kardeşlerimizi ölüme mahkûm eden, gezegenimizin ocağında çelik garabetleri peydahlayan oydu!"
